Author: whatluke
Title: ⭐🌟 [ANN][ICO] cosquare - Shopping is social. ⭐🌟
Body: Hello, thanks for your message.  We are not sure if you completely understand our project, as your comment about going through the buying process to obtain cryptocurrency isn't relevant for cosquare.  cosquare is a social marketplace that connects people with brands and their products. It accepts payments from all major crypto and fiat currencies and uses its own cosquare token (CSQ) to build a innovative incentive ecosystem where certain actions and good intentions are rewarded.  Users purchase products using CSQ, crypto or fiat, and all payments to brands are processed in fiat. Let us know if you have anymore questions as we'll be happy to help

Author: whatluke
Title: ⭐🌟 [ANN][ICO] cosquare - Shopping is social. ⭐🌟
Body: Hello. We noticed that we may have given you incorrect information here, which we do apologise for! However, brands on the cosquare platform don't actually accept crypto. Whilst the buyers have the option of purchasing in crypto or fiat, the brands receive fiat.

Author: whatluke
Title: ⭐🌟 [ANN][ICO] cosquare - Shopping is social. ⭐🌟
Body: Thanks for your message!  A few points in response: -    All payments to companies (brands) are processed in fiat currency. cosquare acts as a buffer so brands do not have to accept or deal with cryptocurrencies directly. -    Influencers earn a % of the product value of a sale they trigger. cosquare distributes this in CSQ. Again, the brand does not have to deal with CSQ or any crypto directly. -    Users can exchange their CSQ to fiat and cash out at the end of the day.

Author: whatluke
Title: ⭐🌟 [ANN][ICO] cosquare - Shopping is social. ⭐🌟
Body: Hi, that's a good question. cosquare seamlessly merges the worlds of e-commerce and social media into a globally scalable social marketplace with its own blockchain powered currency.  We will transform how brands and people (consumers and influencers) interact to redefine online shopping and make online shopping rewarding and influencer marketing accessable to everyone. At cosquare, every user is considered both a potential consumer and an influencer.

Body: How does the project create value to the ecosystem and differ from competing projects?

Author: whatluke
Title: ⭐🌟 [ANN][ICO] cosquare - Shopping is social. ⭐🌟
Body: cosquare differs in two ways. It benefits its two stakeholders: people and brands. For people, any user can be both an influencer and consumer and earn for their social activity, empowering users to monetise their own data. For brands, cosquare provides the ideal platform to engage in the crypto-sphere, combining payment methods: CSQ, cryptocurrencies and fiat currencies. cosquare respects brands’ existing commercial set ups while helping them transition towards the future of shopping.

Author: jols
Title: ⭐🌟 [ANN][ICO] cosquare - Shopping is social. ⭐🌟
Body: What are the benefits for cosquare token holders?

Author: whatluke
Title: ⭐🌟 [ANN][ICO] cosquare - Shopping is social. ⭐🌟
Body: Hi, the CSQ is a pure payment and utility (hybrid) token that can be used on the cosqure social marketplace to pay for purchases. Purchases using the CSQ offering the highest payback reward to consumers for these transactions. When someone becomes a influencer themselves and their social activity results in a purchase transaction, that influencer earns a percentage of the sale amount which is paid in CSQs. Furthermore, an influencer can engage directly with brands through smart contracts to market products to their social following and rewards to influencers are also paid in CSQs. The rewards can be spent on the marketplace or exchanged into fiat currency and cashed out. One other feature is the Peer-to-peer transfers of CSQ that enable a user to gift another user CSQ to spend on cosquare.

Author: whatluke
Title: ⭐🌟 [ANN][ICO] cosquare - Shopping is social. ⭐🌟
Body: Hi, we appreciate that you took the time to check our project. The brands on the cosquare platform don't actually accept crypto. Whilst the buyers have the option of purchasing in crypto or fiat, the brands receive fiat.
